name: dopey
content:
dopey adjective
(DRUGGED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
wanting to sleep, because or as if you have taken a drug: He had taken a sleeping tablet the night before and still felt dopey.

dopey adjective
(STUPID)
silly or stupid: He's nice, but a bit dopey.
